description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) spoofing vulnerability CVE-2024-43580:

1. Ensure your Microsoft Edge browser is updated to at least version 130.0.2849.46.
2. Utilize the Microsoft Update Catalog to download and apply the KB-130.0.2849.46 update.
3. Restart your browser after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
This update addresses an insufficient UI warning issue regarding dangerous operations within Microsoft Edge. It mitigates the risk associated with spoofing attacks, enhancing the security of the browser.
- For manual installation, download the update package from: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB43580.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running a compatible version of Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based).
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
